propiedades_criticas: name, description, address (structured), geo (lat/lon), numberOfRooms, floorSize, petsAllowed, amenityFeature (array)
ejemplo_codigo_json_ld: { "@type": "RealEstateListing", "name": "Villa Sunset Ibiza", "address": { "@type": "PostalAddress", "streetAddress": "Calle Sant Josep 45", "addressLocality": "Sant Josep", "postalCode": "07829", "addressCountry": "ES" }, "geo": { "@type": "GeoCoordinates", "latitude": "38.9167", "longitude": "1.3000" }, "numberOfRooms": "6", "floorSize": { "@type": "QuantitativeValue", "value": "450", "unitCode": "MTK" }, "amenityFeature": [{ "@type": "LocationFeatureSpecification", "name": "Infinity Pool" }] }
impacto_seo_vertical: Crítico para aparecer en búsquedas inmobiliarias + rich snippets propiedades
como_validar: Google Rich Results Test + Search Console Rich Results report
notas_implementacion: Schema específico real estate más fuerte que Product genérico
